chooseFilesToUpload: Choose files for uploading from your device, or use drag & drop
name: Name
wantToEmpty: Are you sure you want to empty
stayUpToDate: Stay up-to-date with file storage version history
doYouWantToTakeSnapshot: Do you want to take a archival snapshot
selectWhereToMove: Please select where you would like to move your file
locationForKey: Location for this key to be used
wantToApproveAccess: Are you sure you want to approve access
removeAccessDescription: Removing Access means that you will not have future access to this data, any previously downloaded data is still accessible to you but will no longer be synced
deletionError: There was an issue with deletion. Please try again
uploadError: There was an issue with upload. Please try again
snapshotError: There was an issue with your snapshot. Please try again.
moveToError: There was an issue moving your file. Please try again.
editError: There was an issue with your edit. Please try again.
creationError: There was an issue creating your folder or drive. Please try again.
accessUpdatesError: There was an issue with access updates. Please try again.
AccessDenied: This email address is not approved for Alpha; please use your alpha-approved email. If issues continue, contact sam@banyan.computer
secretKeyDescription: Your secret key is the way to unlock your account; create a secret key you can remember and keep it safe – no one else has access to it, not even Banyan, so make sure you can remember it to unlock your account.
keyRequirements: Key must be at least 8 characters
passphraseNotMatch: The passphrases do not match, please try again
enterSecretKeyIntoTextField: Enter the secret key into text field
selectTheme: Select between light and dark themes
paymentIssue: There is an issue with your payment method
snapshotTooltip: Archival snapshots offer a point-in-time glimpse of the file and are useful for versioning.
coldTooltip: Archival storage is for files you want stored safely for a long time and don't plan to access very frequently.
hotTooltip: On-demand storage is for files you plan to access frequently and require quick access to.
warmTooltip: On-demand storage is for files you plan to access frequently and require quick access to.
youHaveNoAccess: You don't have access to this drive
requestAccessDescription: Do you want to request access?
driveHasSnapshot: This drive already has a snapshot
acceptTermsAndService: I have read and accept Banyan`s Terms of Service
betaBannerWarning: Banyan Storage is still in Beta and not production-ready. We recommend using a backup storage method for anything stored on Banyan at this time. If you need to store data in Prod today, contact tim@banyan.computer.
syncError: Sync error; please log-out and log-in again to restore latest session
whatAreYouUsingBanyanFor: What are you using Banyan For?
invoicesWillBeAvailiableHere: Invoices and receipts made on your account will be available here
useDesktop: To start using Banyan, please use desktop
